titles.title: Northern Virginia Metrorail Extension Act
To authorize project development for projects to extend Metrorail service in Northern Virginia, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Highways and Transit.

bill.summary:
2/5/2015--Introduced. Northern Virginia Metrorail Extension Act
Authorizes project development for specified Metrorail new fixed guideway capital projects in Virginia.
